titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the last generall asise holden for the county of Sommerset at Taunton. By William Sclater Batchelar in Diuinitie, and minister of the word of God at Pitmsiter
titleStmt.author: Sclater, William, 1575-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for Henry Fetherstone, dwelling in Pauls church-yard at the signe of the Rose,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.

place.placeName: Pauls church-yard at the signe of the Rose
